  • Constructor Details

    • ScheduledTask

      protected ScheduledTask​(Date startDate, Date endDate, Long executionIntervalInMillisecondes, Integer maxExecutions, Boolean canRestartOnFailed, Long restartDelayInMilliSecondes, Integer maxRetry)
      Scheduled Task Constructor
      Parameters:
      startDate - Date when must start the task. (Use 'null' for no delay).
      endDate - Date when must stop the task. (Use 'null' for infinite delay).
      executionIntervalInMillisecondes - Interval in millisecondes between each task execution.
      maxExecutions - Total execution cycles.
      canRestartOnFailed - Allow task to auto restart when execution failed.
      restartDelayInMilliSecondes - Delay for auto restart after execution failed.
      maxRetry - Max execution failed.
